00026 void DnsSdService::Init()
00027 {
00028     Name.Empty();
00029     Protocol.Empty();
00030     Transport.Empty();
00031     nTransport = UNKNOWN;
00032     Domain.Empty();
00033     Port = 0;
00034     HostName.Empty();
00035     RegisteredName.Empty();
00036 }
00037
00038 void DnsSdService::Init( const SimpleString eFullName, uint16_t ePort, const SimpleString eHostName /* = SimpleString::EmptyString */ )
00039 {
00040     int LastFind;
00041     int CurrentFind;
00042
00043     Empty();
00044
00045     if ( eFullName.IsEmpty() || ePort == 0 )
00046     {
00047         return;
00048     }
00049
00050     CompleteServiceName = eFullName;
00051
00052     if ( (LastFind=CompleteServiceName.Find("._tcp.")) >= 0 )
00053     {
00054         // TCP DnsSdService
00055         nTransport = TCP;
00056         Transport  = "_tcp";
00057     }
00058     else
00059     {
00060         if ( (LastFind=CompleteServiceName.Find("._udp.")) >= 0 )
00061         {
00062             // UDP DnsSdService
00063             nTransport = UDP;
00064             Transport  = "_udp";
00065         }
00066     }
00067
00068     // Not a supported protocol...
00069     if ( nTransport == UNKNOWN )
00070     {
00071         Init();
00072         throw ServiceException( "Transport protocol must be '_tcp' or '_udp'" );
00073     }
00074
00075     // Last find is the beginning of the Protocol, its len is 6,
00076     // So we can compute other information.
00077
00078     // Let's try to analyse the name
00079     Domain = CompleteServiceName.SubString(LastFind+6, -1);     // 6 is the len of "._udp." or "._tcp_.";
00080
00081     SimpleString TmpString = CompleteServiceName.SubString( 0, LastFind);
00082
00083     // Search for the last occurence of "._" couple
00084     CurrentFind = TmpString.Find("._", true);
00085
00086     if ( CurrentFind == -1 )
00087     {
00088         Init();
00089         return;
00090     }
00091
00092     // Extract Name an protocol
00093     Name = CompleteServiceName.SubString( 0, CurrentFind );
00094     Protocol = CompleteServiceName.SubString( CurrentFind+1, LastFind );
00095
00096     Port = ePort;
00097
00098     if ( eHostName.IsEmpty() )
00099     {
00100         HostName = Socket::GetHostName();
00101     }
00102     else
00103     {
00104         HostName = eHostName;
00105     }
00106 }
00107
00108 void DnsSdService::Empty()
00109 {
00110     CompleteServiceName.Empty();
00111     Init();
00112 }
00113
00114 bool DnsSdService::CheckProtocol( const SimpleString Protocol )
00115 {
00116     int PreviousUnderscore;
00117     int ProtocolLenght;
00118
00119     if ( Protocol.IsEmpty() )
00120     {
00121         return false;
00122     }
00123
00124     if ( Protocol[0] != '_' )
00125     {
00126         return false;
00127     }
00128
00129     PreviousUnderscore = 0;
00130     ProtocolLenght = -1;
00131     for(;;)
00132     {
00133         ProtocolLenght++;
00134
00135         if( ProtocolLenght >= (int)Protocol.GetLength() )
00136             break;
00137
00138         if( Protocol[ProtocolLenght] == '_' )
00139         {
00140             PreviousUnderscore++;
00141             if ( PreviousUnderscore > 2 )
00142             {
00143                 // protocol must not more than 2 underscores
00144                 // Bad parameters
00145                 return false;
00146             }
00147             continue;
00148         }
00149     }
00150
00151     if ( ProtocolLenght <= 0 )
00152         return false;
00153
00154     return true;
00155 }
00156
00157 bool DnsSdService::CheckName( const SimpleString eName )
00158 {
00159     if ( eName.IsEmpty() )
00160     {
00161         return false;
00162     }
00163
00164     if ( eName.GetLength() > ServiceField-1 )
00165     {
00166             return false;
00167     }
00168
00169     return true;
00170 }

00194 DnsSdService::DnsSdService( const SimpleString ServiceName, const SimpleString eRegType, const SimpleString eDomain, uint16_t ePort, const SimpleString eHostName /* = SimpleString::EmptyString */ )
00195 {
00196     // Create full name.
00197     SimpleString TmpString = ServiceName;
00198     TmpString += ".";
00199     TmpString += eRegType;
00200     if ( eRegType.GetLength() > 0 )
00201     {
00202         if ( eRegType[eRegType.GetLength()-1] != '.' )
00203         {
00204             TmpString += ".";
00205         }
00206     }
00207     TmpString += eDomain;
00208
00209     Init( TmpString, ePort, eHostName );
00210 }
00211
00212 DnsSdService::DnsSdService( const SimpleString eName, const SimpleString eProtocol, TransportProtocol enTransport, const SimpleString eDomain, uint16_t ePort, const SimpleString eHostName /* = SimpleString::EmptyString */ )
00213 {
00214     Empty();
00215
00216     if ( eName.IsEmpty() || eProtocol.IsEmpty() || ePort == 0 || (enTransport != TCP && enTransport != UDP))
00217     {
00218         return;
00219     }
00220
00221     // Check parameters values
00222     if ( CheckProtocol( eProtocol ) == false )
00223     {
00224         Init();
00225         return;
00226     }
00227     Protocol = eProtocol;
00228
00229     // Check parameters values
00230     if ( CheckName( Name ) == false )
00231     {
00232         Init();
00233         return;
00234     }
00235
00236     Name = eName;
00237
00238     if ( eDomain.IsEmpty() )
00239     {
00240         Domain = "local.";
00241     }
00242     else
00243     {
00244         Domain = eDomain;
00245     }
00246
00247     if ( enTransport == TCP )
00248     {
00249         Transport = "_tcp";
00250     }
00251     else
00252     {
00253         Transport = "_udp";
00254     }
00255     nTransport = enTransport;
00256
00257     Port = ePort;
00258
00259     if ( eHostName.IsEmpty() )
00260     {
00261         HostName = Socket::GetHostName();
00262     }
00263     else
00264     {
00265         HostName = eHostName;
00266     }
00267 }

00269 SimpleString DnsSdService::ToString()
00270 {
00271     SimpleString Generate(Name);
00272 /*  Generate += ".";
00273     Generate += Protocol;
00274     Generate += ".";
00275     Generate += Transport;
00276     Generate += ".";
00277     Generate += Domain; */
00278     Generate += " on port ";
00279     Generate += Port;
00280     Generate += " of host ";
00281     Generate += HostName;;
00282
00283     return Generate;
00284 }

00324 RegisterService::~RegisterService()
00325 {

00332 void FUNCTION_CALL_TYPE RegisterService::DnsRegisterReply( DNSServiceRef sdRef, DNSServiceFlags flags, DNSServiceErrorType errorCode, const char *name, const char *regtype, const char *domain, void *context )
00333 {
00334     RegisterService * Mythis = (RegisterService*)context;
00335
00336     if ( errorCode == kDNSServiceErr_NoError )
00337     {
00338         Mythis->Registered = true;
00339         Mythis->RegisteredName = name;
00340         Mythis->CompleteServiceName = name;
00341         Mythis->CompleteServiceName += ".";
00342         Mythis->CompleteServiceName += regtype;
00343         Mythis->CompleteServiceName += domain;
00344     }
00345     else
00346     {
00347         Mythis->Registered = false;
00348     }
00349 }

00355
00356 bool RegisterService::Register(bool AutoRename /*= true */)
00357 {
00358     if ( Registered )
00359     {
00360         OmiscidError( "Service is already registrered.\n" );
00361         return false;
00362     }
00363
00364     int err = kDNSServiceErr_Unknown;
00365     SimpleString ProtocolAndTransport;        // <Name> . "_tcp" or <Name> . "_udp"
00366
00367     ProtocolAndTransport  = Protocol;
00368     ProtocolAndTransport += ".";
00369     ProtocolAndTransport += Transport;
00370
00371     err = DNSServiceRegister( &DnsSdConnection,  kDNSServiceFlagsNoAutoRename, 0 /* all network */,
00372         (char*)Name.GetStr(), (char*)ProtocolAndTransport.GetStr(),
00373         (char*)Domain.GetStr(), NULL, (uint16_t)htons(Port), (uint16_t)Properties.GetTXTRecordLength(),
00374         (char*)Properties.ExportTXTRecord(), DnsRegisterReply, (void*)this );
00375
00376      //err = DNSServiceRegister( &DnsSdConnection, kDNSServiceFlagsNoAutoRename, 0,
00377         //    "Yop", "_bip._tcp", "local.", NULL, (uint16_t)htons(Port),
00378         //0, "", DnsRegisterReply, (void*)this );
00379
00380     if ( err == kDNSServiceErr_NoError )
00381     {
00382         // We did connection to the DNS-SD Daemon
00383         ConnectionOk = true;
00384
00385         // Wait for its answer
00386         if ( DNSServiceProcessResult( DnsSdConnection ) == kDNSServiceErr_NoError )
00387         {
00388             err = kDNSServiceErr_NoError;
00389         }
00390     }
00391     else
00392     {
00393         ConnectionOk = false;
00394         DNSServiceRefDeallocate(DnsSdConnection);
00395         DnsSdConnection = NULL;
00396     }
00397
00398     return Registered;
00399 }
